definitions: a forked bone (the furcula) between the neck and breast of a bird. According to a popular custom, this bone from a cooked bird is broken by two people, with the holder of the longer portion being entitled to make a wish.
shortDefinitions: forked bone furcula between neck and breast of bird

definitions: a forked element in the suspension of a motor vehicle or aircraft, typically attached to a wheel at one end with the two arms hinged to the chassis
shortDefinitions: forked element in suspension of motor vehicle or aircraft end with two arms

definitions: a boom in two halves that curve outward around a sail and meet aft of it.
shortDefinitions: boom in two halves which curve outwards around sail and meet aft of it

definitions: an offensive formation in which the fullback lines up immediately behind the quarterback with the two halfbacks behind and on either side of the fullback.
shortDefinitions: offensive formation in which fullback lines up immediately behind quarterback with two halfbacks behind and on either side of fullback
